# [Interview #79: DragonCon SciFi Channel Chat, Entry #17](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=79#17)

#### Kjell

Is it possible to go to the dreamworld in the flesh, and take something with you out through the gateway?

#### Robert Jordan

No.
